description:
First, Shinobu`s little sister, Miyabi, is a total brat! Onsokumaru decides it`s time for a little one-on-one... just her, him, and his crocodile power-suit! Then, Shinobu`s being kicked out of the manor?! Maybe Kaede`s family would be interested in adopt
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I. Onsokumaru Está Furioso! / II. Shinobu Foge!
Onsokumaru Gets Angry / Shinobu Leaves the Manor
Onsokumaru se fâche / Shinobu quitte le manoir
Onsokumaru, Okoru no Maki / Shinobu, Ie o Deru no Maki
音速丸, 怒るの巻 / 忍, 家を出るの巻
